outputs.output_descr: The aim of the project is to develop a GEF Full-Sized Project (FSP) under the Climate Changte theme "to build capacity of Sri Lanka on the use of Biomass to generate energy."  The PPG will enable the project to collect background information on renewable energy options, conduct stakeholder interviews, develop technology options, and prepare management arrangements plus the initial set up for the FSP implementation.

The aim of the project is to develop a GEF Full-Sized Project (FSP) under the Climate Changte theme "to build capacity of Sri Lanka on the use of Biomass to generate energy."  The PPG will enable the project to collect background information on renewable energy options, conduct stakeholder interviews, develop technology options, and prepare management arrangements plus the initial set up for the FSP implementation.

project_descr: Promoting Sustainable Biomass Energy Production and Modern Bio-Energy Technologies
